104231.name: Inequality measures
104231.description:
The wealth inequality gini coefficients are for 2000 for the US and Sweden and 2003 for Japan.

The earnings inequality and disposable income inequality gini coefficients are for 2004 for the US, 2005 for Sweden and 2006 for Japan. The US and Swedish earnings inequality and disposable income inequality ginis are from the Leiden Budget Incidence Fiscal Redistribution Database, and the Japanese are from the OECD.
